import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import DefaultLayout from '../components/DefaultLayout' import { Col, Row,Form,Input } from 'antd' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { addCar, getAllCars } from '../redux/actions/carsActions' import Spinner from '../components/Spinner' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' function EditCar() { const {cars}=useSelector(state=>state.carsReducer) const dispatch=useDispatch() const {carid}=useParams() const {loading}=useSelector(state=>state.alertsReducer) const [car,setCar]=useState() function onFinish(values){ values.bookedTimeSlots=[] dispatch(addCar(values)) } useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getAllCars()) if (car) { setCar(cars.find(o=>o._id==carid)) } },[]) return ( {loading && ()}

Edit Car

 ) } export default EditCar
